A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I thought that nothing could be any worse than Episode VIi\, the Farce awakens - but they managed it with the last Jedi.- unfortunately it won't be the last\, 
What's wrong with it? - Bad & wooden acting\, non-funny funny bits\, Porgs\, Lord Voldemort\, Porgs\, cute little moppets wielding brooms and pretending to be jedi\, Porgs\, a plot so thin it wasn't there\, bad editing\, Porgs a complete disregard of Physical laws - namely explosive decompression\, Porgs\, a guest appearance by Dobby the house-elf\, and last but not least PORGS! Apparently\, porgs are not just for Chrismas\, but this turkey certainly should be.
The ONLY redeeming feature are the beautifully designed Crystal Cats.
Shame they don't eat Porgs!
